definition[0]: the language used in Britain, the US, Australia, and some other countries
example[1]: leaflets written in plain English  (=English that is easy to understand)
definition[1]: literature written in English, studied as a subject at school or university
example[2]: She decided to major in English.
definition[2]: relating to England or its people
definition[3]: relating to the language used in Britain, the US, Australia, and some other countries
